r.d: SQLite3 is a PHP extension for use with the SQLite database system. This extension bundles SQLite 3.5.9 though the minimum requirement is 3.3.9.
r.n: - Upgraded bundled SQLite to 3.5.9 - Implicitly free resource statements on SQLite3d destruction rather than throw an error - Added arginfo data for all methods for reflection - Added SQLite3::querySingle() which can either return the first column or an entire row
